long_description: The Exotac NanoStriker XL(TM) firestarter includes a larger rod and handle than the original NanoStriker for improved ease of use, yet it still is small enough to be carried as a keychain. Striker handle is 46% bigger than on the original, making it easy to grip; 33% larger ferrocerium rod allows for more than 3,000 strikes, as compared to 1,000 on the original. Ferrocerium rod stows inside the knurled body; unscrew the rod, flip it around and screw it back on and it's ready for use. Rod works when dry or wet-simply scrape it with the tungsten carbide striker to send sparks flying; provides more than 3,000 strikes and can be replaced. NanoStriker XL is 3.6 in. long when stowed and 4.2 in. long when in use. O-rings keep moisture from getting inside and onto the striker and the rod. Exotac NanoStriker XL(TM) firestarter includes a split ring for carrying keys, a lanyard, an extra set of O-rings and an instruction manual.
short_description: The Exotac NanoStriker XL(TM) firestarter includes a larger rod and handle than the original NanoStriker for improved ease of use, yet it still is small enough to be carried as a keychain.
